select sid, member_id, qid, push_dt, is_submit, stage,insert_dt, modify_dt from tiq_daily_question_push limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select q.sid, q.sort, q.group_code, q.recommend_course, q.title, q.answer_options, q.answer_key, q.analyse, q.type, q.two_type,q.ques_type, q.ques_sign, q.ques_tag, q.lever, q.remark, q.is_valid, q.insert_dt, q.modify_dt,p.sid push_id,p.stage,p.is_submit,r.is_correct from tiq_daily_question_push p left join tiq_daily_question q on p.qid = q.sid left join (select qid,is_correct from tiq_member_daily_question_record where member_id = #{memberId}) r on r.qid = p.qid where p.member_id = #{memberId} and q.is_valid = 1 order by p.push_dt desc,p.insert_dt desc limit 1

select q.sid, q.sort, q.group_code, q.recommend_course, q.title, q.answer_options, q.answer_key, q.analyse, q.type, q.two_type,q.ques_type, q.ques_sign, q.ques_tag, q.lever, q.remark, q.is_valid, q.insert_dt, q.modify_dt,p.sid push_id,p.stage from tiq_daily_question_push p left join tiq_daily_question q on p.qid = q.sid where p.member_id = #{memberId} and q.is_valid = 1 order by p.insert_dt desc
select aa.member_id from( select a.* from( select member_id,is_submit from tiq_daily_question_push order by insert_dt desc) a GROUP BY a.member_id having a.is_submit = 1)aa
